p: Results were expressed as Mean ± standard deviation (SD). Statistical analysis was performed using the statistical package GraphPad prism version 5 (GraphPad software, San Diego CA, USA). The significant difference in the means was determined using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA; 95% confidence interval). Tukey post hoc tests were performed for comparison of all groups with control and comparison of all pairs of groups, respectively. Values of α 0.05 were considered as significant [ 26].
